SEARCH
Package server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
server.Server
public final class Server extends Object
The Server class implements a simple HTTP server that serves static files and handles file uploads. It includes functionality for handling GET requests to serve static files and POST requests to upload files.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    (package private) static final class 
    Server.RootHandler
    The RootHandler class handles GET requests for serving static files.
    (package private) static final class 
    Server.UploadHandler
    The UploadHandler class handles POST requests for uploading files.

      private Server()

  • Method Details

    • serveFile

      static void serveFile(HttpExchange exchange, File file) throws IOException
      Sends the specified file as a response to the client.
      Parameters:
      exchange - The HttpExchange object representing the client's request and response context.
      file - The file to be sent to the client.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while sending the file.

    • serve404

      static void serve404(HttpExchange exchange) throws IOException
      Sends a 404 (Not Found) response to the client.
      Parameters:
      exchange - The HttpExchange object representing the client's request and response context.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while sending the response.

    • getContentType

      static String getContentType(File file)
      Determines the content type of the specified file based on its extension.
      Parameters:
      file - The file for which to determine the content type.
      Returns:
      The content type of the file.

    • removeHeaders

      static byte[] removeHeaders(byte[] data)
      Removes HTTP headers from the byte array.
      Parameters:
      data - The byte array containing HTTP headers and content.
      Returns:
      The byte array with HTTP headers removed.

    • findHeaderEndIndex

      static int findHeaderEndIndex(byte[] data)
      Finds the index where the HTTP header ends in the byte array.
      Parameters:
      data - The byte array containing HTTP headers and content.
      Returns:
      The index where the HTTP header ends, or -1 if the end sequence wasn't found.

    • findEndHeaderIndex

      static int findEndHeaderIndex(byte[] data)
      Finds the index where the ending header starts in the byte array.
      Parameters:
      data - The byte array containing HTTP content.
      Returns:
      The index where the ending header starts, or -1 if the sequence wasn't found.

    • serve500

      static void serve500(HttpExchange exchange) throws IOException
      Sends a 500 (Internal Server Error) response to the client.
      Parameters:
      exchange - The HttpExchange object representing the client's request and response context.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while sending the response.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception
      The main method starts the HTTP server on the specified port and creates handlers for requests.
      Parameters:
      args - Command-line arguments.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while starting the server.
